ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, they are of similar levels but not the same stats.  Basically, some sets have more AC and less stats, other have more stats and less AC.  I think you can
ygData.messageBody:
Well, they are of similar levels but not the same stats. Basically, some
sets have more AC and less stats, other have more stats and less AC. I
think you can look up the details on Allakhazams (however you spell it).

Halana, 60th Shamaness
Tani, 51st Bardette
Solusek Ro

>
> -Faras
